intro: Sceletium strictum, commonly known as kanna, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family and is characterized by its succulent, shrub-like appearance. The plant produces small, yellow flowers and has a unique ability to store water in its fleshy leaves. Its roots contain alkaloids that have been traditionally used for their stimulant and sedative properties. Sceletium strictum is also known for its resilience in arid environments.
